long_description:
This summer pack a picnic and bring a blanket to claim your spot at Calistoga’s Concerts in the Park series. This free weekly summer celebration takes place every Thursday night and features some of the area’s best musicians and local wineries. Escape the hustle and bustle of wine country on your Napa Valley Getaway vacation and unwind under the shady canopy of trees at Pioneer Park with a glass of wine in hand.

Sip Wines of Napa Valley

Select wines are available for purchase and highlight a different local winery each week. This summer’s lineup includes Calistoga wineries such as Envy Wines, von Strasser, and smaller family-owned wineries like Madrigal Family Winery and Maldonado Family Vineyards. Owned and operated by Lupe Maldonado and his son Hugo, Maldonado’s father-son duo oversees the entire winemaking project, from farming the vineyard to bottling. Although you are allowed to bring your own alcoholic beverages to the park, make sure to support the local vintners!

Listen to Some Tunes

Join one of the area’s most beloved bands for an unforgettable live performance. Upcoming acts include Maya, a Latin tribute band playing hits from the biggest Latino artists of all time, such as Santana, Selena, Gloria Estefan, and more. Bring your dancing shoes and expect a wide variety of Latin music styles from this band, including Cumbia, Tex Mex, Salsa, Cha Cha, Latin Rock, and Merengue. For a rockabilly act with a sprinkle of blues and surf rock, check out LC Diamonds, bringing you the high energy vintage music that will get you on your feet. Referred to as the ‘British Elvis’, expect lead singer Shaun Hornby to play classics from The Beatles, Eric Clapton, Elvis Presley, and Jerry Lee Lewis.

Retreat to the Wine Country Inn & Cottages

After your night of wine and music, continue your relaxing wine country escape at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages and Cottages. Only a 10-minute drive from Pioneer Park, relax on your own private patio with panoramic valley vineyard views. Wake up to a complimentary wine country breakfast with an assortment of local delicacies. If you loved your Concerts in the Park local vintner, let us set you up with a visit to one of our recommended local wineries. Guests will also have access to our wine reception for a personal tasting hosted by a local vintner, held every Friday and Saturday evening.

--

The Calistoga Concerts in the Park summer series kicks off every Thursday, from 6:30 to 8:30pm. Go to Visit Calistoga for a full lineup of musicians and attending wineries.
title: Experience a Night of Live Music and Wine at Calistoga’s Concerts in the Park
